```ts reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota.rs/tree/develop/client/bindings/nodejs/examples/06_simple_block.ts
```

You can run the example by running the following command from the `bindings/node/examples/` folder:

```bash
node dist/06_simple_block.js
```
